original_title: TU action; No night mail trains to Badulla today
original_body_lines: Several trains, including the night mail train from Colombo Fort to Badulla and Badulla to Fort, have been cancelled, the Railways Department said.

They said even though the Railway Drivers Union had decided to launch their trade union action at midnight today, several trains have been canceled as hundreds of railway passengers were inconvenienced as a result of this.
